title_narrative: Capacity development and experience sharing for rice value chains through south-south and triangular cooperation (SSTC)
description_narrative: To improve capacity of the participating countries to develop competitive and inclusive rice value chains. Through the project, host countries will receive assistance to strengthen the capacities to develop national research/training institutes and experts in order to disseminate knowledge and experience to local stakeholders, also have a chance to exchange technology and experience in terms of rice cultivation, good seed, mechanization, post-harvest, and policy among Africa and Asia.
recipient_region_vocabulary_uri: you can update this URI in resources/utils.properties  file, after first deploy. Or set default in JAR resourcesJar/utils.properties
